name: Creative Destruction 2
description:
• Creative destruction 2.

The Battle Royale Returned UNOFFICIALLY and With Improvements

  • Main Improvements:
  • Higher Graphic Quality
Higher Performance and Optimization
New Map
  • What's new in the update:
    Building System in beta.
    New weapon: Sword.
    Ability to destroy the environment.
    Free camera (activated with the TAB key).
    New Character.
    Mini map.
    recoil.
  • Keys:
    W,a,s,d: movement
    Space: Jump
    Shift: crouch
    TAB: 360 camera
    T: Sword
    1: Shotgun
    2: AK47
    Q: Ladder
    ESC: Exit the game.

All characters in the game are from Netease

Game Made On Unreal Engine 4
